# fetchpxw

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of fetchpxw is to make it easyer to download data from pxweb databases by creating helper functions to the pxweb package.

## Installation

You can install the development version of fetchpxw from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("christianlindell/fetchpxw", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```
